# beginParagraph()

**Instance Method**

Sets up layout parameters at the beginning of a paragraph.

## Declaration

```swift
func beginParagraph()
```

## Discussion

Concrete subclasses should invoke this method at the beginning of their [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSTypesetter/layoutParagraph(at:)] implementation.

## Laying out a paragraph

- **layoutParagraph(at:)**: Lays out glyphs in the current glyph range until the next paragraph separator is reached.
- **endParagraph()**: Sets up layout parameters at the end of a paragraph.
- **beginLine(withGlyphAt:)**: Sets up layout parameters at the beginning of a line during typesetting.
- **endLine(withGlyphRange:)**: Sets up layout parameters at the end of a line during typesetting.
